channel.title: The: 'Help me think of a good idea for a website' Thread
channel.description:
Domain: www.zexco.com
What I like: /b/tard humour (not a whole lot) torrents warez music programming (php/java) "computers" in general "news" in general
What I want: a creative website that'll suit my interests so I won't abandon it. I'll also most likely be doing all the coding so I want some original ideas, something people need but they don't know it yet cuz they're too dumb to have thought of it -- that's where you come in.
Any questions just ask.
[size=30pt][font=Tahoma]NOTHING RUNESCAPE RELATED. DIE.[/font][/size]
btw, http://craz.zzl.org for more info, or slightly less...

item.title: The: 'Help me think of a good idea for a website' Thread
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

Xaocx111:

If you want my opinion i would suggestion making a site that uses no sud-domain(those tend to get tricking) also i would suggest you make a site that allows other people to make one too. for example mine is related to newbiehacker. (http://xaocx.newbiehacker.net)

nah it would be ok for things like http://www.images.zexco.com/ and http://www.torrents.zexco.com/ that way it will be all nice and organized. Also imo you should just make a multi purpose site for everything you stated that way you are appealing to a much wider audience and then you have more chance to increase your uniqueys

Read full topic

item.description:

and idk, I’ve thought of doing that before, but I’m looking for a site to profit out of…

Read full topic

item.title: The: 'Help me think of a good idea for a website' Thread
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:1, topic:189184”]What I like:
/b/tard humour (not a whole lot)
torrents
warez
music
programming (php/java)
“computers” in general
“news” in general[/quote]

Why don’t you combine that? On the home page you put some news, and have sections where you put other shit.

item.source: The: 'Help me think of a good idea for a website' Thread

item.title: The: 'Help me think of a good idea for a website' Thread
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Uriko, post:8, topic:189184”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=252041.msg2109400#msg2109400 date=1205555591]

magma, i’ll kill you

billygotshot… like torrentz.com kinda? or unrefined.info?

yes but since your not purely into torrents and warez you could do that plus computer stuff… Such as tutorials and shit on random stuff news about what is new in technology and stuff like that.
[/quote]
Idk, I’d rather have a focal point on a website… considering starting an online game website again tbh.

Make a site learn people how to use something off that they learn i programing.
And not just a bunch off commandos.

Meh, I was also considering a tutorial site but they’re pretty lame, I have a ton of tutorial sites bookmarked because they’re useful but I never go to them.[/quote]

It would depend on what you like the most out of the list you have.

Read full topic
